overall.description: Return an array (ndim >= 1) laid out in Fortran order in memory.

dtype.description: By default, the data-type is inferred from the input data.

out.description: The input a in Fortran, or column-major, order.

note: Note: This function returns an array with at least one-dimension (1-d)  so it will not preserve 0-d arrays. '
